description: Dialogs are overlaid modal paper based components with a backdrop.
propAria-describedby: The id(s) of the element(s) that describe the dialog.
propAria-labelledby: The id(s) of the element(s) that label the dialog.
propChildren: Dialog children, usually the included sub-components.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propDisableBackdropClick: If `true`, clicking the backdrop will not fire the `onClose` callback.
propDisableEscapeKeyDown: If `true`, hitting escape will not fire the `onClose` callback.
propFullWidth:
If `true`, the dialog stretches to `maxWidth`.

Notice that the dialog width grow is limited by the default margin.
propMaxWidth:
Determine the max-width of the dialog.
The dialog width grows with the size of the screen.
Set to `false` to disable `maxWidth`.
propOnBackdropClick: Callback fired when the backdrop is clicked.
propOnClose: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.
propOnEscapeKeyDown:
Callback fired when the escape key is pressed,
`disableKeyboard` is false and the modal is in focus.
propPaperComponent: The component used to render the body of the dialog.
propScroll: Determine the container for scrolling the dialog.
propTransitionComponent:
The component used for the transition.
[Follow this guide](/components/transitions/#transitioncomponent-prop) to learn more about the requirements for this component.
propTransitionDuration:
The duration for the transition, in milliseconds.
You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.
propTransitionProps:
Props applied to the transition element.
By default, the element is based on this [`Transition`](http://reactcommunity.org/react-transition-group/transition) component.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesScrollPaper: Styles applied to the container element if `scroll="paper"`.
stylesScrollBody: Styles applied to the container element if `scroll="body"`.
stylesContainer: Styles applied to the container element.
stylesPaperScrollPaper: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `scroll="paper"`.
stylesPaperScrollBody: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `scroll="body"`.
stylesPaperWidthFalse: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth=false`.
stylesPaperWidthXs: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="xs"`.
stylesPaperWidthSm: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="sm"`.
stylesPaperWidthMd: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="md"`.
stylesPaperWidthLg: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="lg"`.
stylesPaperWidthXl: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `maxWidth="xl"`.
stylesPaperFullWidth: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `fullWidth={true}`.
stylesPaperFullScreen: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `fullScreen={true}`.
